title: Daily Review with Clay and Buck - Dec 10 2021
itunes:title: Daily Review with Clay and Buck - Dec 10 2021
description:
Rob Smith: Black, gay, and Republican, gives his perspective on the Jussie Smollett verdict.

Kari Lake: Former news anchor and Arizona gubernatorial candidate on the invasion at the border.

The LeBron James "hate crime" story that disappeared and Clay's journey to the truth.

A caller tells Clay to back off teasing Buck about his scooter.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
